definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Can I check this stroller at the gate?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在登機門託運嬰兒推車嗎？

sentences.english: These suitcases are too heavy to carry; we need a trolley.
sentences.chinese: 這些衣箱太沉了，我們需要一輛小手推車。

sentences.english: In addition to conveying dollies , pallet conveying is also possible within the system.
sentences.chinese: 除了輸送推車，托盤輸送也有可能在系統內。

sentences.english: One day he put the hats into his barrow and went along the road to the market.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他把帽子放進手推車裏，沿路去市場。

sentences.english: The placement of dollies on carrier pallets can also easily be carried out after the palletizing process.
sentences.chinese: 安置承運人托盤推車上也可以輕易地進行後碼垛進程。

sentences.english: I watched the Barrow Prisons for over 10 thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 我守護這個手推車鐵籠子已經有1萬多年了。

sentences.english: Put him in the stroller, then put the high chair back to it's place.
sentences.chinese: 將他放在嬰兒推車，然後把高椅放回到它的地方。

sentences.english: The fruit tumbled from the overturned cart.
sentences.chinese: 水果從翻倒的手推車裏滾出來。

sentences.english: The costermonger are barrowing apples and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 小販用手推車裝運蘋果和蔬菜。

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys .
sentences.chinese: 它能用輕便的拋射推車發射水上飛機。

sentences.english: For protecting your Stokke?Xplory? when travelling.
sentences.chinese: 可以保護您的推車，當您旅行的時候。

sentences.english: The cart and fruit were overthrown by a speeding car.
sentences.chinese: 手推車和水果被一輛急馳而過的汽車撞翻了。

sentences.english: Practical and beautiful decorating strips can be installed on the upper round of barrows .
sentences.chinese: 推車上圍可加裝美觀實用的裝飾條。

sentences.english: He trundled a wheel barrow down the path.
sentences.chinese: 他推着手推車沿路走過。

sentences.english: He peddled fish from a pushcart.
sentences.chinese: 他推着手推車沿街賣魚。

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys.
sentences.chinese: 它能用輕便的拋射推車發射水上飛機。

definition: car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
